reconnectOnLoginDeny.name: Reconnect After Login Deny
reconnectOnLoginDeny.description: Automatically reconnect after a login has been denied (for example: if you're banned, you're playing with the wrong Minecraft version, if you're not whitelisted, etc.)

reconnectOnKick.name: Reconnect After Kick
reconnectOnKick.description: Automatically reconnect after you've been kicked from the server
